Author: siu - Chainmakers#3920
Content: here For people that have doubts about the state of the chain or the snapshot. The possibility to stay with this same chain has gone up to 95% now. @jl777c has not finished debugging and fixing the issues we have, we will announce when it is ready for everyone to play. BUT, since we are inviting people to mine the chain again, we will do a new snapshot in the future JUST in case that we do need to change to a new chain.  Hope this answers any questions you guys have about the snapshot.

Author: siu - Chainmakers#3920
Content: The snapshot we did at block 27k will be invalidated now.

Author: TonyL#3577
Content:
```
#!/bin/bash
BETS=0
while [ $BETS -lt 500 ]; do
    hash=$(komodo-cli -ac_name=KMDICE dicebet KMDICE 5be49570c56d036abb08b6d084da93a8a86f58fc48db4a1086be95540d752d6f 0.001 1500 | jq -r .hex)
    txid=$(komodo-cli -ac_name=KMDICE sendrawtransaction $hash >> bets_odds_1500.txt)
    let BETS=BETS+1
done
```
